result.title: 2010 Defra MB0102 2B distribution of Dermocorynus montagnei in the United Kingdom and Isle of Man
result.name: 2010-defra-mb0102-2b-distribution-of-dermocorynus-montagnei-in-the-united-kingdom-and-isle-of-m
result.notes:
This layer shows the distribution of a red seaweed, Dermocorynus montagnei, a Biodiversity Action Plan Species. In some references Dermocorynus montagnei may have previously been refered to as Grateloupia montagnei.
      
      This layer forms one of a set of data layers created for the Defra MB0102 contract.  This work will support the delivery of a network of Marine Protected Areas as required to meet existing international and national obligations and commitments, including Marine Conservation Zones (MCZs), a new measure to be delivered as part of the Marine and Coastal Access Bill, and equivalent measures under Scottish legislation.  The availability of these data layers will also be of importance in underpinning Marine Planning (e.g. licensing) in our marine area.

extras.value: ["Public version freely available but must be gridded (10 km square grid resolution). Non public point or polygon data to 10km grid squares resolution"]
